messages.title: GENERAL ELECTION SPECIAL
messages.content: Lib-Dems in Parliament Are Bad for Gateshead

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Criticizes Lib-Dems for reneging on election pledges, including raising VAT, and states Labour will fight for North East Gateshead and Low Fell people.

politicalExperience.achievements: Ian Mearns has a strong track record of advocating for Gateshead in Parliament and helping his constituency staff team.

images.caption: Ian Mearns pictured smiling in a suit.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet criticizes the Liberal Democrats for their partnership with the Conservative party and their policy decisions which are implied to have negatively impacted the North East area. It emphasizes the local issues for the constituency of Gateshead.
